languages.text: "Итак, Кикеросс хочет убить меня в следующем бою, но ты готов организовать побег. Мне нужно просто выжить на арене, дождаться знака от тебя и сбежать. Вряд ли ты имеешь ввиду буквальную пасть, так что, видимо, прыгать надо будет в какой-то портал. Все верно?"

traits.locale_text: "Итак, Кикеросс хочет убить меня в следующем бою, но ты готов организовать побег. Мне нужно просто выжить на арене, дождаться знака от тебя и сбежать. Вряд ли ты имеешь ввиду буквальную пасть, так что, видимо, прыгать надо будет в какой-то портал. Все верно?"

languages.text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"
languages.original_text: "Итак, Кикеросс хочет убить меня в следующем бою, но ты готов организовать побег. Мне нужно просто выжить на арене, дождаться знака от тебя и сбежать. Вряд ли ты имеешь ввиду буквальную пасть, так что, видимо, прыгать надо будет в какой-то портал. Все верно?"

traits.locale_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

"So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

"So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

"So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

languages.text: “也就是说，绮克萝丝打算在下一场战斗中就杀了我，但你已经做好了逃跑的准备。我要做的事情，就是在竞技场上想办法存活下来，等待你的信号，准备逃跑。你指的‘巨口’，肯定不是字面意义上的嘴巴，所以我应该要跳到某种传送门之类的东西里。我理解得对吗？“
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: “也就是说，绮克萝丝打算在下一场战斗中就杀了我，但你已经做好了逃跑的准备。我要做的事情，就是在竞技场上想办法存活下来，等待你的信号，准备逃跑。你指的‘巨口’，肯定不是字面意义上的嘴巴，所以我应该要跳到某种传送门之类的东西里。我理解得对吗？“

languages.text: «De modo que Keykeross planea matarme en la siguiente pelea, pero estás listo para ayudarme a escapar. Solo tengo que sobrevivir en el coliseo, esperar tu señal y echar a correr. No creo que te refieras a fauces literales, por lo que imagino que quieres que salte a algún tipo de portal. ¿Voy bien?».
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: «De modo que Keykeross planea matarme en la siguiente pelea, pero estás listo para ayudarme a escapar. Solo tengo que sobrevivir en el coliseo, esperar tu señal y echar a correr. No creo que te refieras a fauces literales, por lo que imagino que quieres que salte a algún tipo de portal. ¿Voy bien?».

languages.text: 「要するに、キーケロスは次の戦いで{mf|俺|私}を殺すつもりだが、お前は{mf|俺|私}を逃がす準備がある。闘技場で生き延び、お前が出す合図を待って、一気に逃げろということか。文字通りの『口』を指すはずがないから、なんらかのポータルに飛び込めということだな？」
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: 「要するに、キーケロスは次の戦いで{mf|俺|私}を殺すつもりだが、お前は{mf|俺|私}を逃がす準備がある。闘技場で生き延び、お前が出す合図を待って、一気に逃げろということか。文字通りの『口』を指すはずがないから、なんらかのポータルに飛び込めということだな？」

languages.text: "Keykeross will mich also im nächsten Kampf töten, doch Ihr seid bereit, mir zur Flucht zu verhelfen. Ich muss nur die Arena überleben, auf Euer Zeichen warten, und dann laufen. Einen echten Mund meint Ihr gewiss nicht, also soll ich wohl in ein wie auch immer geartetes Portal springen. Nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Keykeross will mich also im nächsten Kampf töten, doch Ihr seid bereit, mir zur Flucht zu verhelfen. Ich muss nur die Arena überleben, auf Euer Zeichen warten, und dann laufen. Einen echten Mund meint Ihr gewiss nicht, also soll ich wohl in ein wie auch immer geartetes Portal springen. Nicht wahr?"

languages.text: « Donc Keykeross prévoit de me tuer lors du prochain combat, mais vous êtes disposé à m'aider à m'échapper. Tout ce que je dois faire, c'est survivre dans l'arène, attendre votre signal et prendre la fuite. Quand vous parlez de gueule, je suppose que ce n'est pas littéral ; vous me suggérez donc de sauter dans une sorte de portail. J'ai tout compris ? »
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: « Donc Keykeross prévoit de me tuer lors du prochain combat, mais vous êtes disposé à m'aider à m'échapper. Tout ce que je dois faire, c'est survivre dans l'arène, attendre votre signal et prendre la fuite. Quand vous parlez de gueule, je suppose que ce n'est pas littéral ; vous me suggérez donc de sauter dans une sorte de portail. J'ai tout compris ? »

languages.text: "Keykeross, sıradaki dövüşte beni öldürmeyi planlıyor ama sen kaçışımı sağlamaya hazırsın. Tek yapmam gereken; arenada sağ kalmak, işaretini beklemek, ardından da koşmak. Gerçek bir ağızdan bahsetmen kesinlikle mümkün değil, bu nedenle bir tür portala sıçramamı kastediyor olmalısın. Doğru anlamış mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "So, Keykeross is planning to kill me in the next fight, but you are ready to effect my escape. All I must do is survive the arena, wait for your sign, then run. You cannot possibly mean into a literal mouth, so you must mean for me to leap into a portal of some kind. Do I have that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Keykeross, sıradaki dövüşte beni öldürmeyi planlıyor ama sen kaçışımı sağlamaya hazırsın. Tek yapmam gereken arenada sağ kalmak, işaretini beklemek, ardından da koşmak. Gerçek bir ağızdan bahsetmen kesinlikle mümkün değil. Bu nedenle bir tür portala sıçramamı kastediyor olmalısın. Doğru anlamış mıyım?"
